lead_paragraph: A bill to regulate fracking, an oil and gas extraction technique relatively new to Florida and vigorously opposed across the state, was voted down on Thursday by a state Senate committee.

headline.print_headline: Florida: Bill to Regulate Fracking Fails to Advance
headline.main: Florida: Bill to Regulate Fracking Fails to Advance

snippet: A bill to regulate fracking, an oil and gas extraction technique relatively new to Florida and vigorously opposed across the state, was voted down on Thursday by a state Senate committee.
abstract: Florida State Senate Appropriations Committee rejects bill to regulate fracking in state; some environmentalists and residents had raised concerns about effect technique would have on underground aquifers, source of drinking water for almost entire state.
